dejv.commons.jfx.input.properties

Class GestureEventProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • dejv.commons.jfx.input.properties.GestureEventProperties

  • public class GestureEventProperties
extends Object
    Holder class for desired properties of GestureEvent.

    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    dejv78 (dejv78.github.io)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GestureEventProperties

        public GestureEventProperties(GestureModifiers gestureModifiers)

    • Method Detail

      • getModifiers

        public GestureModifiers getModifiers()
        Requests the current Modifiers setting.
        Returns:
        The current set of Modifiers for this GestureEvent.

      • isMatching

        public boolean isMatching(javafx.scene.input.GestureEvent event)
        Check, whether the given GestureEvent is matching the current properties.
        Parameters:
        event - GestureEvent to test.
        Returns:
        True, if no modifiers are set, or the event matches exactly the properties. False, if some modifiers are set, and the event doesn't match them, or if the event is null.
